full_summary:
GOVERNMENT TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT
**Project Title:** 01581-240108 Plot Combine

**Project Reference Number:** WS4211755172-Doc4213156080

**Project Sponsor:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Project Description:**

Canada seeks offers for the supply and delivery of a research-based Plot Combine for production of breeder seed according to the specifications identified for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) at the Indian Head Research Farm (IHRF).

**Project Specifications:**

* **UNSPSC Code:** 21101700 - Agricultural machinery for harvesting and 70141900 - Crop harvesting
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Project Timing:**

* **Project Start Date:** December 6, 2023
* **Project End Date:** June 30, 2024

**Procurement Details:**

* **Closing Date:** November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (14:00 HNE)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity Contact Information:**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Wiebe, Lyland (SPAC/PSPC) - lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Project Notice:**

* **Project Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17732896?extsite=MTc3MzI4OTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note the updated closing date. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM
